name: SMS ALL NET
details: For P5.00 subscribers can loan 5 texts to any network valid for 24hrs. This variant is worth 4 points.

name: SMS ON NET
details: For P4.00 subscribers can loan 4 texts to SMART/TNT numbers valid for 24hrs. This variant is worth 3 points.

name: BIGTEXT 7
details: For P7.00 subscribers can loan 9 texts to SMART/TNT numbers valid for 24hrs. This variant is worth 5 points.
